vsParam:
[px],
I have something to tell you...

Yeah? Sounds serious.
What's going on?

Here's the thing...
I've decided to leave the Academy.

Because of some family issues, I must go back to be a smith. You
took care of me the most, hence I figured that I should tell you first.

Anyway, that's about it! Although I won't be around for long...
I'll treasure my days with you just like before.

Gee, he's leaving the Academy...
But, there's nothing we can do about it...

You are right...
[px], is this really OK?

Oh... Even if you say that,
we can't force him to stay...
At least we should give him a gift!

A gift?
Is it a farewell gift?

Oh... Ho ho. That's an idea only [px] could think of.
To remind him of the Academy all the time, right?

I like this idea too. Even though he'll leave the Academy, the deep
emotions among "family members" will never disappear!

So [px]!
What gift are you going to make?

If you haven't gotten an idea yet,
how about giving him a hammer?

Since he'll be a smith,
a hammer is a necessity...

Anise, that's a great idea!
Let's do it!

Uh huh. Hammer...
Can we leave it to you to make it, [px]?

Then it's settled! [px]!
Please make him a super hammer, a hammer full of memories!
